= Determining Server Capabilities =

Calling [http://jscep.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/documentation/com/google/code/jscep/client/Client.html#getCaCapabilities() getCaCapabilities()] on the [http://jscep.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/documentation/com/google/code/jscep/client/Client.html Client] will yield a new [http://jscep.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/documentation/com/google/code/jscep/response/Capabilities.html Capabilities] instance, which provides information on each of the capabilities supported by the SCEP server.


{{{
client.getCaCapabilities();
}}}

= Retrieve CA Certificate =

{{{
client.getCaCertificate();
}}}

= Retrieve Rollover CA Certificate =

{{{
client.getNextCaCertificate();
}}}
